game.name: RNG JAM
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Classic arcade basketball meets roguelite chaos. Generate a random duo, place high-stakes bets between quarters, and stack power-ups to survive a sweaty 2-on-2 gauntlet. No microtransactions. Just vibes, risk, and explosive dunks.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Classic arcade basketball meets roguelite chaos. Generate a random duo, place high-stakes bets between quarters, and stack power-ups to survive a sweaty 2-on-2 gauntlet. No microtransactions. Just vibes, risk, and explosive dunks.
